list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing on which a bird alights or roosts, typically a branch or a horizontal rod or bar in a birdcage.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the budgerigar shuffled along its perch
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Budgerigar xáo trộn dọc theo cá rô của nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an edible freshwater fish with a high spiny dorsal fin, dark vertical bars on the body, and orange lower fins.
(of a bird) alight or rest on something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a herring gull perched on the mast
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một con mòng cá trích nằm trên cột buồm
